sentences.en: ...an attempt to revive the economy.
sentences.cn: …一次重振经济的尝试。

sentences.en: A dash of cold water will revive a person who has fainted.
sentences.cn: 泼洒冷水可使昏厥的人复苏.

sentences.en: A dash of water in his face will revive him.
sentences.cn: 向他脸上泼水能使他苏醒.

sentences.en: All attempts to revive the fishing industry were foredoomed to failure.
sentences.cn: 千方百计振兴渔业注定徒劳无功.

sentences.en: Among such friends, however, and such flattery, he did revive.
sentences.cn: 然而, 在这些朋友中间, 在这样殷勤地接待下, 他真的振奋了.

sentences.en: an attempt to revive the steel industry
sentences.cn: 复苏钢铁工业的努力

sentences.en: Brian O'Neill now sought to revive the old high kingship.
sentences.cn: 布里安·奥尼尔想恢复往昔的最高王位.

sentences.en: Economists argued that freer markets would quickly revive the region's economy.
sentences.cn: 经济学家认为更加自由的市场将使这个地区的经济迅速复苏。

sentences.en: He is seeking advice on how to revive the stagnant economy.
sentences.cn: 他正在就如何振兴低迷的经济征求意见。

sentences.en: Here is a dish that will revive jaded palates.
sentences.cn: 这道菜简直可以恢复迟钝的味觉.

sentences.en: Local people have decided to revive this centuries-old tradition.
sentences.cn: 当地人决定复兴这一延续了数个世纪的传统。

sentences.en: She and a neighbour tried in vain to revive him.
sentences.cn: 她和邻居想尽一切办法都没能让他苏醒过来。

sentences.en: The doctors revived her with injections of glucose.
sentences.cn: 医生给她注射葡萄糖，使她苏醒过来。

sentences.en: The economy is beginning to revive.
sentences.cn: 经济开始复苏。

sentences.en: The paramedics couldn't revive her.
sentences.cn: 护理人员无法使她苏醒。

sentences.en: Their efforts to revive him were futile.
sentences.cn: 他们对他抢救无效.

sentences.en: These flowers will revive in water.
sentences.cn: 这些花在水中会再活.

sentences.en: They failed to revive her sagging spirits.
sentences.cn: 他们未能让她从萎靡消沉中振作起来。

sentences.en: They managed to revive the injured driver with cardiac massage.
sentences.cn: 他们通过心脏按压使受伤的司机苏醒了过来.

sentences.en: This is likely to revive consumer spending and a whole raft of consumer industries.
sentences.cn: 这可能会带动消费性支出和一大批消费工业的复苏。

sentences.en: We would revive them with humor or a sympathetic word.
sentences.cn: 我们往往讲一些幽默之话或讲一两句同情的话,使他们打起精神来.

words.tran_cn: 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神；再生效
信仰复兴运动；复兴倾向
领导宗教复兴运动的人；复旧者
使复活，使恢复（revive的过去式）
使再生，使复活；使振奋精神
使复兴；使苏醒；回想起；重演，重播

trans.tran_en: to bring something back after it has not been used or has not existed for a period of time

trans.tran_cn: 复苏，恢复，振作，恢复，再生，重新流行，再生效力
使复活，使恢复，使振奋，复原，使再生，使重新流行，唤醒，唤起
